column3: Includes buffet-style breakfast lunch and dinner in the main restaurant. Snacks are available at selected times between meals
Your breakfast lunch and evening meal are included in the price of a Full Board holiday. That means all you've got to worry about are the drinks!
Both your breakfast and evening meal are already paid for in the price of your holiday so all the big meals are taken care of!
Your breakfast is included in the price of your holiday.
No meals are included with your holiday however you'll be provided with some catering facilities in your room.
As the name suggests  only the room is included in this option.
